amendment.description: To provide hurricane assistance to certain holders of fishery finance program loans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3819 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3819 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S4009; text: CR S4009) To provide hurricane assistance to certain holders of fishery finance program loans.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3819 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3819 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Vitter.
